ehema unoth aayemath ee ganath post ekak liyannamko.ithin me mutti damillata labune etharam prasadajanaka prathichara ehema neweyi.ee nisama mamath mutti damilla nawaththala damma.madyapanaya gana eyage hithe thibune budu hamuduruwanta podi mistek ekak wela aanantharya papa karma walata athulath karanna thibunu ekakya me pasweni silpade hatiyata dala thiyenne kiyala.eyalage pawule hamomath math pan mathak kalath kalanthe dana sayis eke kattiya kiyalayi mata katha bahen therune.eeth dan thawath ee wade kaldannama bari awasthawak thamayi me awilla thiyenne.kathakarala dekin ekak thiranaya karannama wenawa adama.mulu andum prashne hinda eya honda mud eheka inna nisa mata hithuna adama thama maha mathpan arbudayath wisanda ganna hondama dawasa kiyala."

sobhadahame dakina deya ee ayurinma pitapath nokota ardha shailigatha bawakin eya dakwimata mema shilpiya dara athi uthsahaya prashansaniyaya.daru senehasa, minisun ha sathun athara athiwana bhawamaya sabandathawaya kawyamaya aruthin idiripath kirimata mohu dakwa aththe imahath dakshathawayaki.jorj kit men mohuda samakalina sampradayaya ismathu kirima sandaha yodagena aththe rosa ha dumbauru pahayanya.in itha siyum ha mrudu hagim danawimata hethema samath wi thibe.sampradayika kalarithiyen boho seyin bahara wi batahira chithra kalawe nawa aarakin sankalanaya kota ohu yodaganu labu kadunu rekha hethukota gena minis rupawala yam wikruthi swabhawayak ismathu wi atha.eya ohutama awenika wu swabhawayaki..ema rithiya thula daraniyagala siya kalawa kerehi dakwu akalpaya ha awanka bawa nirupanaya karayi.ohu warna yodagena aththe gudathwaya pilibanda hagim danawimata samathwana ayurini.warna ha rekha mangin prabala hangim jananaya kirimata samath aatopa bahula chithra sampradayak ethuma kruthin hi dakiya haka.

sahenna duka hithuna lankawe wishwawidyalayaka aakalpa gana ee kale kalaniye widya anshaye pitadhipathi mahacharya nalin da silwa deshana waladi kellanta kiya kiya giya wijathika denim anduma andagena kampas aawoth chinthana kollanta kiyala bled parawal denawa kiyala...
labuwawu 2017 wasara jiwithayata aruthbara yamak ekathuwana wasarak wewayi kiya pathanawa.
eyama beheth kaden eka eka jathi genath kudu karala hadagaththa dun kudu mishranayakin tikak mita molawala aragena eyin tika tika kabalata hala hala dun kabalath aran ge pura awidina eka...

wiharaya sambandha karyalayakda mema maluwehi pihituwa thibe.

ayi ape aanduwata barida nesabi samiwaraya brithanya parlimenthuwata likhithawa yomu kala thorathuru matha illimak karanna.
eetath wada madura kamathi amma aathal gannawa balan inna.
ketiyen kiwathoth yudha jayaga්rahanaya awasthawe menma me mohotheda jawipe me ratata erehi deshapalana bala kandawura niyojanaya karana pakshayaki.
me maga dige yana apata ape hamuda niladharin dakwu sahayogaya imahathya.
me wena kota...
welawak nathnam masekata ekak hari liyahan kalayak yanakam...
japanaya thula bonsayi wyaptha wima [sanskaranaya]
guwan widuli natya samanga sambandhawimatada mata labunu awasthawa ithama suwisheshiyi.
kumari akka kiya aththe mata ma bawa dan hondatama pahadiliyi..
brahmanaya, me alpechcha bawa thama kerehi daknawu mama boho seyin wana wasaya pinisa bhaya nathibawata paminiye wemi.
bangladeshaye idikeruna ekama bauddha chaithyaya meyayi.
ee mula sitama purawasi balayak nirmanaya kirima magini.
gani ee wenakota ti shart eka andagena hitiye.
mewana witath disthrik mattamin sanwidhana katayuthuda mema pirisa diyath kara thibe.
ee athare ape ashwarohaka sebalu niwun balakotuwa gawin kola gangawa anith paththata paninawa."
man kalayak hamathanama bomba pipirena kale hithuwe oya siddhiye wipakaya thamayi mawa suwar ekatama marenne bombayakin thamayi kiyalayi..
habayi ee balakaye paladayithawa ko.
ada eda gana surangana katha kiyana mahindalata amathaka wu boho de thibe.
ehi siti boho denek kiha.
ee unata jathika rupawahiniye ‘asuwal diyani‘ eke ehema wakya kiyanne aga indan mulata.
uuwe sinhala katha karana pirisa athara samanthata athi lengathu kama ha kamaththata samana lengathu kamak uuwe drawida bhashawa katha karana pirisa athara selwata himiwa thibe.
padaye bera handala kiyala kiyanne.
eeth wenasak na.

lankaweda deshape්ramaya, tha්rasthawadaya, pa්rajathantha්rawadaya, yahapalanaya, rata bedima, wani sankalpa nipadawanneth eyata anuwa mema panthi wuwamana ha bala wuwamana matha ek ek lebal alawa wiwidha aya namakaranaya karanneth madhya magini.

‘aasiya/ pasifik sinama karmanthaye eekabaddhathawa ha sanwardhanaya udesa’ yanna mehi themawayi.aasiya/ pasifik ratawala wruththantha chithrapata sandaha wu tharagakari ansha, ema ratawala keti wartha ha sajiwi krutha chithrapata sandaha wu tharagakari ansha, jagath sinama kruthi wenuwen wu panoramawa, juri samajikayange chithrapata, jagath sinama aramudala anugraha dakwu chithrapata, koriyan sinama dakma, hanoyi nagaraya pilibanda thanu chithrapata, 1986 n pasu wiyatnam punarjiwana samaye chithrapata, samakalina wiyatnam chithrapata yana kotas rashiyakin mema ulela samanwitha wiya.winishchaya mandala thunak sthapitha kara thibuni.
